Welcome to blog! My Name is Fredrick but I also go by DerfOh in various communities. I use this blog as my home for my projects and meandering thoughts as well as a tool to chronicle my journey through the world of programming, software, and technology. I hope that in some way this will be a useful resource for someone who may be starting their own journey with coding.
